OneD, Koch Modular partner to scale up silicon-graphite EV anode materialsOneD Battery Sciences and Koch Modular said on Wednesday they have teamed up to build a factory in North America to produce enough silicon-graphite anode material to supply batteries for around 1 million EVs annually. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:03:29 GMT V3CGSGZTQ5JJ5HAIYEQYZ4WBWY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/oned-koch-modular-partner-scale-up-silicon-graphite-ev-anode-materials-2024-01-17/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
On visit to Ireland, Chinese premier eyes deeper economic tiesChina would like to deepen economic and trade cooperation with Ireland, particularly in areas of "huge potential" such as green technologies and the digital economy, Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday during a trip to Dublin. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 13:36:51 GMT 3OE4EZDEAVPC7HDXYM3JPGMDYE https://www.reuters.com/world/visit-ireland-chinese-premier-eyes-deeper-economic-ties-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
India rejects iron ore miner NMDC's proposal for China exports -sourcesIndia's government has turned down a request from state-owned iron ore miner NMDC Ltd to export its ore to China, the world's largest iron ore consumer, three sources with direct knowledge said. Philippines defence minister calls out China official for "gutter-level talk"The Philippines' defense secretary on Wednesday accused a Chinese foreign ministry official of insulting President Ferdinand Marcos Jr during a news briefing, stooping to what he called "low and gutter-level talk." Wed, 17 Jan 2024 11:25:25 GMT NHRR6F3YPBKQBOVGCAVSJBICRM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-defence-minister-calls-out-china-official-gutter-level-talk-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区

Exclusive: BYD to stop making pouch batteries for its hybrid EVs on leakage concernsChina's BYD plans to end production of the pouch-type batteries used in its best-selling hybrids as the automaker seeks to address durability concerns and the risk that they could leak, said three people familiar with the matter. China's SAIC set to add 14 vehicle vessels to boost exportsSAIC Motor Corp plans to add 14 vehicle vessels in the next three years to its fleet of carriers as the state-owned Chinese automaker aims to boost sales in overseas markets, it said on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 10:06:38 GMT DNYRPS34LBKE5CQWFPZX36BQFI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-saic-set-add-14-vehicle-vessels-boost-exports-2024-01-17/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Weak data, limited stimulus keep investors away from ChinaChina's patchy economic growth and a renewed slump in home sales have redoubled investors' resolve to steer clear of the country's markets, sending shares tumbling as foreigners quit in the absence of fresh policy support. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 08:05:16 GMT OD2AMPPOPQVI37LBC3PQDJRT5I4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/weak-data-limited-stimulus-keep-investors-away-china-2024-01-17/Tom Westbrook市场宏观问题
Indian, Chinese troops clashed twice in 2022 even as peace talks were onIndian and Chinese soldiers clashed at least two times in 2022 along their Himalayan frontier where they have been involved in a bitter standoff since 2020, according to new details that have emerged from the Indian Army's gallantry award citations. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 07:48:58 GMT RBDNEVOICRPYLCKKH2YROSDM7I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indian-chinese-troops-clashed-twice-2022-even-peace-talks-were-2024-01-17/Krishn Kaushik世界亚太地区
First prosecution witness testifies against Jimmy Lai in Hong KongThe first prosecution witness to testify in a landmark national security case against Hong Kong media tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Wednesday he had been instructed by Lai to call people to join protests in 2019 and draw the attention of western democracies. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 07:47:44 GMT HHUMHRTOVBLJFMEEVO5TKJBXYY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/first-prosecution-witness-testizes-against-jimmy-lai-hong-kong-2024-01-17/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界亚太地区
Tesla slashes Model Y prices in Germany after China price cutsTesla Inc has slashed prices of its Model Y cars in Germany, where it lost the spot as top electric vehicle (EV) seller to Volkswagen in 2023, a week after the carmaker reduced its Model 3 and Model Y prices in China. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 06:22:10 GMT MBX34M4IVRKSRDP2TPAF2TJWJI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-cuts-model-y-prices-germany-after-china-price-cuts-2024-01-17/Hyunjoo Jin, Christoph Steitz商业汽车与交通
